rows.title: Event binding on dynamically created elements?

14: <p>Try to use <code>.live()</code> instead of <code>.bind()</code>; the <code>.live()</code> will bind <code>.hover</code> to your checkbox after the Ajax request executes.</p>

<p>Use the <code>.on()</code> method of jQuery <a href="http://api.jquery.com/on/" rel="noreferrer">http://api.jquery.com/on/</a> to attach event handlers to live element.</p>

<p>Also as of version 1.9 <code>.live()</code> method is removed.</p>
